definitions.usage_example: He is rich. However, he is not happy.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es rico. Sin embargo, no es feliz.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce a statement that contrasts with something said previously.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir una declaración que contrasta con algo dicho previamente.

definitions.usage_example: However you look at it, it's a bad situation.
definitions.usage_example_es: Como sea que lo mires, es una mala situación.
definitions.usage_context_en: In whatever way or manner.
definitions.usage_context_es: De cualquier forma o manera.

definitions.usage_example: I don't know what to do.
definitions.usage_example_es: No sé qué hacer. (No sé lo que debo hacer).
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a relative pronoun to refer to 'the thing(s) that'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como pronombre relativo para referirse a 'la(s) cosa(s) que'.

definitions.usage_example: Though it was cold, I went out.
definitions.usage_example_es: Aunque hacía frío, salí.
definitions.usage_context_en: A less formal version of 'although'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una versión menos formal de 'although'.

definitions.usage_example: He is rich. He is not happy, though.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él es rico. No es feliz, sin embargo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as an adverb at the end of a sentence, meaning 'however'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como adverbio al final de una oración, significando 'sin embargo'.

definitions.usage_example: Even though it was cold, I went out.
definitions.usage_example_es: A pesar de que hacía frío, salí.
definitions.usage_context_en: A stronger, more emphatic version of 'although'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Una versión más fuerte y enfática de 'although'.

definitions.usage_example: He likes coffee, while I prefer tea.
definitions.usage_example_es: A él le gusta el café, mientras que yo prefiero el té.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to contrast two different facts or situations.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para contrastar dos hechos o situaciones diferentes.

definitions.usage_example: I read while I wait.
definitions.usage_example_es: Leo mientras espero.
definitions.usage_context_en: During the time that; at the same time as.
definitions.usage_context_es: Durante el tiempo que; al mismo tiempo que.

definitions.usage_example: She is young, whereas I am old.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella es joven, mientras que yo soy viejo.
definitions.usage_context_en: A formal way to contrast two facts (similar to 'while').
definitions.usage_context_es: Una forma formal de contrastar dos hechos (similar a 'while').

definitions.usage_example: Since you are here, you can help.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ya que estás aquí, puedes ayudar.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce a reason (similar to 'because').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir una razón (similar a 'because').

definitions.usage_example: I have been here since 9 AM.
definitions.usage_example_es: He estado aquí desde las 9 AM.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to indicate a starting point in time that continues to the present.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para indicar un punto de inicio en el tiempo que continúa hasta el presente.

definitions.usage_example: As I was tired, I went to bed.
definitions.usage_example_es: Como estaba cansado, me fui a la cama.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to state a reason (similar to 'because' or 'since').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para indicar una razón (similar a 'because' o 'since').

definitions.usage_example: He sang as he walked.
definitions.usage_example_es: Cantaba mientras caminaba.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to indicate that two actions are happening at the same time (similar to 'while').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para indicar que dos acciones ocurren al mismo tiempo (similar a 'while').

definitions.usage_example: She is as tall as me.
definitions.usage_example_es: Ella es tan alta como yo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to make a comparison of equality (as...as).
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para hacer una comparación de igualdad (tan...como).

definitions.usage_example: I like fruits, for example, apples.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me gustan las frutas, por ejemplo, las manzanas.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce a specific item that illustrates a general point.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir un ítem específico que ilustra un punto general.

definitions.usage_example: Many countries, for instance, Spain, have siestas.
definitions.usage_example_es: Muchos países, por ejemplo, España, tienen siestas.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used as a synonym for 'for example'.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado como sinónimo de 'for example'.

definitions.usage_example: I like citrus fruits, such as oranges.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me gustan las frutas cítricas, tales como las naranjas.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce one or more examples that belong to a category.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir uno o más ejemplos que pertenecen a una categoría.

definitions.usage_example: He is my father's brother. In other words, he is my uncle.
definitions.usage_example_es: Es el hermano de mi padre. En otras palabras, es mi tío.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to explain something in a simpler or different way.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para explicar algo de una forma más simple o diferente.

definitions.usage_example: The meeting was long and boring. In short, a waste of time.
definitions.usage_example_es: La reunión fue larga y aburrida. En resumen, una pérdida de tiempo.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to summarize a situation briefly; in conclusion.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para resumir una situación brevemente; en conclusión.

definitions.usage_example: I will stay home, unless it stops raining.
definitions.usage_example_es: Me quedaré en casa, a menos que deje de llover.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce a negative condition (same as 'if... not').
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir una condición negativa (igual a 'si... no').

definitions.meaning: Siempre y cuando / Con tal de que
definitions.usage_example: You can go, as long as you finish your homework.
definitions.usage_example_es: Puedes ir, siempre y cuando termines tu tarea.
definitions.usage_context_en: Used to introduce a condition that must be true for the main clause to be true.
definitions.usage_context_es: Usado para introducir una condición que debe ser verdad para que la cláusula principal lo sea.

definitions.usage_example: I don't want to go. Besides, I am tired.
definitions.usage_example_es: No quiero ir. Además, estoy cansado.
definitions.usage_context_en: In addition; moreover (used to add another reason).
definitions.usage_context_es: Además; es más (usado para añadir otra razón).

definitions.usage_example: Who else was there besides you?
definitions.usage_example_es: ¿Quién más estaba allí además de ti?
definitions.usage_context_en: In addition to; apart from.
definitions.usage_context_es: En adición a; aparte de.

definitions.usage_example: Overall, the project was a success.
definitions.usage_example_es: En general, el proyecto fue un éxito.
definitions.usage_context_en: Taking everything into account; in general.
definitions.usage_context_es: Teniendo todo en cuenta; en general.
